thread.title: VIDEO: Car appears to roll uphill in neutral on Romanian road | Weird News
thread.title_full: VIDEO: Car appears to roll uphill in neutral on Romanian road | Weird News | ArcaMax Publishing

author: arcamax.com
title: VIDEO: Car appears to roll uphill in neutral on Romanian road | Weird News
text:
BUDESTI, Romania (UPI) -- A Romanian motorist shared video of a car in neutral appearing to roll uphill due to an unusual optical illusion known as a "gravity hill."
The video, posted to YouTube by Cristi Dimulescu, shows the car rolling uphill both backward and forward while in neutral.
The hill, located between the towns of Budesti and Cavnic, is known as a "gravity hill" due to the optical illusion caused by the surrounding landscape.
Experts said gravity hills trick the eye into seeing a steep upward slope where there is actually a slight downward slope.
